attributes.action: Give safe passage to those fleeing war in Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: We cannot stand by as a nation and let the Ukrainian people, who have family ties or not, not enter the UK at this time. In the situation that Ukraine, and it's people, are in its the least we should be able to do. They didn't have a chance to apply before war broke out. We must help these people in such times of unnecessary and wasteful war.
attributes.background: We must help those fleeing war in Ukraine. We must give the Ukrainian people a chance to apply for visas to enter into the UK whether they have family, that are citizens, here or not.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
